titles.title: Fear not, for I am with you x3

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Fear not, for I am with you x3
says the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I have redeemed you,
I have called you by name,
Child, you are mine;
When you walk through the waters
I will be there,
And through the flames;
You will not NO WAY be drowned
You will not NO WAY be burned
For I am with you.
